form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: OFFICIAL LETTER FROM THE CANADIAN IMMIGRATION SERVICE, A 6 699 884

full_text: A 6 699 884 September 2,1955 Officer in Charge. Canadian Immigration Service, Emerson, Manitoba, Canada. Dear Sir: The bearer of this letter, MAO LING LXU, a native and citizen of China, is proceeding to Winnipag, Manitoba, for the purpose of applying to the United States Consul there for an immigrant visa, Mr. Liu, whose photograph is attached below, was pre- examined at this office today under the United States Immigration lawu and found to be admissible to the United States as an immi- grant for permanent residence. This letter is your assurance that he will be readmitted to the United States whether or not he is in possession of an immigrant visa. You will later be notified as to the date and port of his return to the United States. Very truly yours, J.D.Perfetto, Acting Officer in Charge. OFFICIAL COPIES TO: UNITED STATES CONSUL, Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada. OFFICER IN CHARGE - NOYES, MINN., together with duplicate preexamination Border Crossing Identification Card No. 26477. Upon alien's return, please notify the Canadian Immigration Service at Emerson, Manitoba, to that effect, furnishing this office with a copy of your letter. J.D. Perfetto, Acting Officer in Charge.
